publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-3028 Linda Fabiani: Racism-That the Parliament acknowledges the important contribution made by immigrants and refugees, both first and succeeding generations, to Scottish society and welcomes the benefits brought about by living in a racially and culturally diverse community; notes with concern the rise of far right extremism in Europe, and supports the call from the European Monitoring Centre on Racism for an end to the damaging negativity under which issues relating to immigration or asylum are often debated or reported. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill*, Colin Campbell*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, Andrew Wilson*, Fiona McLeod*, Richard Lochhead*, Kay Ullrich*, Fiona Hyslop*
S1M-3028 Racism (lodged on 24 April 2002) Michael Matheson*, Stewart Stevenson*, Michael Russell*, Ms Margo MacDonald*

S1M-3028 Linda Fabiani: Anti-Racism-That the Parliament acknowledges the important contribution made by immigrants and refugees, both first and succeeding generations, to Scottish society and welcomes the benefits brought about by living in a racially and culturally diverse community; notes with concern the rise of far right extremism in Europe, and supports the call from the European Monitoring Centre on Racism for an end to the damaging negativity under which issues relating to immigration or asylum are often debated or reported. Supported by: Mr Kenny MacAskill, Colin Campbell, Mr Duncan Hamilton, Andrew Wilson, Fiona McLeod, Richard Lochhead, Kay Ullrich, Fiona Hyslop, Michael Matheson, Stewart Stevenson, Michael Russell, Ms Margo MacDonald, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-3028 Anti-Racism (lodged on 24 April 2002) Brian Adam*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Mr Adam Ingram*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*, Christine Grahame*, Mr Jamie Stone*
S1M-3028 Anti-Racism (lodged on 24 April 2002) Alex Neil*, Tommy Sheridan*
S1M-3028 Anti-Racism (lodged on 24 April 2002) Nora Radcliffe*, Donald Gorrie*
S1M-3028 Anti-Racism (lodged on 24 April 2002) Mr Keith Raffan*, Shona Robison*
S1M-3028 Anti-Racism (lodged on 24 April 2002) Tricia Marwick*
